description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract Receiver (SendEther.sol#31-54) has payable functions:
	 - Receiver.fallback() (SendEther.sol#41-45)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract [Receiver](SendEther.sol#L31-L54) has payable functions:
	 - [Receiver.fallback()](SendEther.sol#L41-L45)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

description: Receiver.attack() (SendEther.sol#47-49) ignores return value by _target.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(sendEtherWithCall(address),address(this))) (SendEther.sol#48)

Sender.sendEtherWithTransfer(address)._contract (SendEther.sol#11) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _contract.transfer(2000000000000000000) (SendEther.sol#12)

Sender.sendEtherWithSend(address)._contract (SendEther.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- sent = _contract.send(2000000000000000000) (SendEther.sol#16)

Sender.sendEtherWithCall(address)._contract (SendEther.sol#21) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (sent,data) = _contract.call{value: 2000000000000000000}() (SendEther.sol#22)

Receiver.constructor(address).target (SendEther.sol#37) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _target = target (SendEther.sol#38)
Pragma version^0.8.11 (SendEther.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7
markdown: Pragma version[^0.8.11](SendEther.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7

description: solc-0.8.11 is not recommended for deployment
markdown: solc-0.8.11 is not recommended for deployment

description:
Low level call in Sender.sendEtherWithCall(address) (SendEther.sol#21-24):
	- (sent,data) = _contract.call{value: 2000000000000000000}() (SendEther.sol#22)

Low level call in Receiver.attack() (SendEther.sol#47-49):
	- _target.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(sendEtherWithCall(address),address(this))) (SendEther.sol#48)

Parameter Sender.sendEtherWithSend(address)._contract (SendEther.sol#15) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Sender.sendEtherWithCall(address)._contract (SendEther.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
Variable Receiver._target (SendEther.sol#33) is not in mixedCase
Variable Receiver._lastsender (SendEther.sol#34) is not in mixedCase
